Title: Cervin and Rhone v. Costa Rica
Status: Decided in favor of neither Party
Institution: ICSID - International Centre for Settlement of Investment Disputes
RulesOfArbitration: ICSID (International Centre for Settlement of Investment Disputes) Rules of Procedure for Arbitration Proceedings (2006)
ApplicableTreaties: Agreement between the Swiss Confederation and the Republic of Costa Rica on the Promotion and Reciprocal Protection of Investments (2000_
